description:
Kin’emon, Momonosuke, and the others can’t fight back tears when they hear that Hiyori is alive.
Zoro is stunned by Enma’s demonic power and its ties to him.
And as the day of the Fire Festival is finally in sight, Kin’emon and the others head out for the rendezvous point.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cuenta regresiva. Los Sombrero de Paja pasan al ataque
